languages.text: {n}Невидимая сила оттолкнула призраков прочь от человеческих построек, сковала их чудовищный танец и защитила подданных Лорд-капитана от буйств ксеносов.{/n}
{n}An invisible force pushed the wraiths away from the structures, stopped their horrifying dance, and shielded the Lord Captain's subjects from the rampage of the xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Невидимая сила оттолкнула призраков прочь от человеческих построек, сковала их чудовищный танец и защитила подданных Лорд-капитана от буйств ксеносов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An invisible force had pushed the wraiths away from the man-made structures, stopped their horrifying dance, and shielded the Lord Captain's subjects from the rampage of the xenos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}某种看不见的力量将幽灵从建筑旁驱散，停止了它们可怕的舞蹈，成功保护领主舰长的臣民免受狂暴异形的伤害。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible force pushed the wraiths away from the structures, stopped their horrifying dance, and shielded the Lord Captain's subjects from the rampage of the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}某种看不见的力量将幽灵从建筑旁驱散，停止了它们可怕的舞蹈，成功保护领主舰长的臣民免受狂暴异形的伤害。{/n}
{n}某种看不见的力量将幽灵从人造建筑边驱散，停止了他们可怕的舞蹈，成功保护领主舰长的臣民免受狂暴异形的伤害。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una fuerza invisible empujó a los espectros lejos de las estructuras, detuvo su aterrador baile y protegió a los súbditos {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán de la masacre de los xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible force pushed the wraiths away from the structures, stopped their horrifying dance, and shielded the Lord Captain's subjects from the rampage of the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una fuerza invisible empujó a los espectros lejos de las estructuras, detuvo su aterrador baile y protegió a los súbditos {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán de la masacre de los xenos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}目に見えない力がまぼろしを構造物から遠ざけ、彼らのおぞましい舞を停止させ、ゼノの凶暴行為からロード・キャプテンの従者を守った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible force pushed the wraiths away from the structures, stopped their horrifying dance, and shielded the Lord Captain's subjects from the rampage of the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目に見えない力がレイスを人工構造物から遠ざけ、彼らのおぞましい舞を停止させ、ゼノの凶暴行為からロード・キャプテンの従者を守った。{/n}
{n}目に見えない力がレイスを人工構造物から遠ざけ、彼らのおぞましい舞を停止させ、ゼノの凶暴行為からロード・キャプテンの従者を守った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une force invisible repousse les spectres loin de toute structure, met un terme à leur danse macabre et protège les sujets {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} du déferlement enragé des xénos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible force pushed the wraiths away from the structures, stopped their horrifying dance, and shielded the Lord Captain's subjects from the rampage of the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une force invisible repousse les spectres loin de toute structure, met un terme à leur danse macabre et protège les sujets {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} du déferlement enragé des xénos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine unsichtbare Kraft vertrieb die Geister von den Strukturen, machte ihrem grauenhaften Tanz ein Ende und schützte die Untertanen des Lord Captains vor den wütenden Xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible force pushed the wraiths away from the structures, stopped their horrifying dance, and shielded the Lord Captain's subjects from the rampage of the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine unsichtbare Kraft vertrieb die Geister von den Strukturen, machte ihrem grauenhaften Tanz ein Ende und schützte die Untertanen des Lord Captains vor den wütenden Xenos.{/n}

{n}Eine unsichtbare Kraft hat die Geister von den Gebäuden der Menschen weggezogen, ihrem grauenhaften Tanz ein Ende bereitet und die Untertanen des Lord Captains vor dem Wüten der Xenos beschützt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Görünmeyen bir güç, tayfları yapılardan iterek tüyler ürperten danslarını durdurdu ve zenoların taşkınlıklarına karşı Lord Kaptan'ın tebaasına kalkan oldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An invisible force pushed the wraiths away from the structures, stopped their horrifying dance, and shielded the Lord Captain's subjects from the rampage of the xenos.{/n}
